      • release

        public void release()
             throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IReader
        Releases the connection with the card. After calling this method, either connect or reset has to be called to communicate again with the card.
        Specified by:
        release in interface IReader
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs when releasing the reader.

        Resets the card and returns the ATR.

        Returns:
        ATR of the card. It will never be null unless an exception is thrown.
